dcterms:creator: Maria Korosteleva
Sung-Hee Lee
dcterms:description: A dataset covering a variety of garment designs, including variations of t-shirts, jackets, pants, skirts, jumpsuits, and dresses, with 22,000 garments sampled from 19 base types. Each garment sample contains a garment 3D model as draped on SMPL average woman body shape in T-pose, a corresponding sewing pattern represented as a structure, and a corrupted 3D model imitating some of the 3D scanning artifacts.
dcterms:title: Dataset of 3D Garments with Sewing Patterns

dcterms:creator: Maria Korosteleva
Sung-Hee Lee
dcterms:description: This dataset introduces a method for generating datasets of 3D garments with sewing patterns, which is referenced in the context of the main dataset used in the paper.
dcterms:title: Dataset of 3D Garments with Sewing Patterns (as introduced in another paper)
